Rewards Rate: Up to 10% NeuCoins on TataNeu Spends, 5% NeuCoins on Tata Brand Spends and 1.5% NeuCoins on UPI Spends
Domestic Lounge Access: 8 Complimentary Domestic Lounge Access Every Year (2 Each Quarter)
International Lounge Access: 4 Free Visits for Primary and Add-On Cardholders Each Year (One Per Quarter)
Insurance Benefits: Insurance cover worth ₹1 crore against air accidents, cover worth ₹15 lakhs against emergency hospitalization and lost card liability cover worth up to ₹9 lakhs.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: The renewal fee is waived off on achieving annual spends of Rs. 3 lakhs or more.
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver for all fuel transactions in India between ₹400 and ₹5,000.
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the Amount Withdrawn of ₹500, Whichever is Higher

product_details: Get 10% NeuCoins on your spends on Tata Neu app.
Get 5% NeuCoins on Tata’s partner brands and 1.5% Neu coins on other spends.
Get complimentary domestic and international lounge access.
Low foreign currency markup fee of 2%.
1% fuel surcharge waiver up to Rs. 500 per month.
Spend-based waiver of the renewal fee.
